snippet: Guard Stefan Markovic scored 5 straight points to help Serbia defeat Belgium, 76-69, at the European championships in Slovenia.
abstract: Serbia defeats Belgium, 76-69, at European basketball championships in Slovenia.
lead_paragraph: Guard Stefan Markovic scored 5 straight points to help Serbia defeat Belgium, 76-69, at the European championships in Slovenia.

headline.main: Serbia and Latvia Prevail at European Championships
